Verses: 1 un Aagaaraththaith Thanneergalmel Podu; Anega Naatkalukkup Pinbu Adhin Palanaik Kaanbaai.
2 ezhuperukkum Ettuperukkum Pangittukkodu; Boomiyinmel Enna Aabaththu Neridumo Unakkuth Theriyaadhu.
3 megangal Niraindhirundhaal Mazhaiyai Boomiyinmel Pozhiyum; Maramaanadhu Therke Vizhundhaalum Vadakke Vizhundhaalum, Vizhundha Idaththileye Maram Kidakkum.
4 kaatraik Gavanikkiravan Vidhaikkamaattaan; Megangalai Nokkugiravan Arukkamaattaan.
5 aaviyin Vazhi Innadhendrum, Karppavadhiyin Vayitril Elumbugal Uruvaagum Vidham Innadhendrum Nee Ariyaadhirukkiradhupolave, Ellaavatraiyum Seygira Dhevanudaiya Seyalgalaiyum Nee Ariyaai.
6 kaalaiyile Un Vidhaiyai Vidhai; Maalaiyile Un Kaiyai Negizhavidaadhe; Adhuvo, Idhuvo, Edhu Vaaikkumo Endrum, Irandum Sariyaai Payanpadumo Endrum Nee Ariyaaye.
7 velichcham Inbamum, Sooriyanaik Kaanbadhu Kangalukkup Piriyamumaame.
8 manushan Anega Varusham Jeeviththu, Avaigalilellaam Magizhchchiyaayirundhaalum, Avan Irulin Naatkalaiyum Ninaikkavendum; Avaigal Anegamaayirukkum; Vandhu Sambavippadhellaam Maayaiye.

9 vaalibane! Un Ilamaiyile Sandhoshappadu, Un Vaaliba Naatkalile Un Irudhayam Unnaip Poorippaakkattum; Un Nenjin Vazhigalilum, Un Kannin Kaatchigalilum Nada; Aanaalum Ivaiyellaavatrinimiththamum Dhevan Unnai Nyaayaththile Konduvandhu Niruththuvaar Endru Ari.
10 nee Un Irudhayaththilirundhu Sanjalaththaiyum, Un Maamsaththilirundhu Theengaiyum Neekkippodu; Ilavayadhum Vaalibamum Maayaiye.
